title: Japan 2025
content: There's a reason everyone says to avoid Japan in the Summer. It's hot. Everyday. I never knew how much we take for granted the constant central air conditioning of home, and yet, that's my only real complaint. My third time being here in just over a year and a half, spending my final, fleeting moments of youth before here has been a great experience, but one that also fills me with excitement for my future.
